alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:01AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF RIPLEY COUNTY THROUGH 1030 AM EDT... At 1000 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Greensburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesville, Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Sunman, Holton, Napoleon, Millhousen, Rexville, Benham, Ballstown, Penntown, New Marion, Versailles Lake, Otter Village, Olean and Huntersville. This includes I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 149 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
